>
[Senses of the Bear](/Feats.aspx?ID=4087) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 183 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200)

</column>

---

While in ursine form, you gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416) and [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet. If you already had low-light vision, you instead gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
